So here's my idea @_buildspace 
I wanna make an app/website where Cinephiles,gymbros,music lovers,book worms,Lego nerds, tech bros,motorheads or maybe the fight club fans & many more can find their communities, get to know about their kinda folks & can show up at the meet-ups:)) https://t.co/RFmhdXaxI1
